Token.Abstract: Simple category on NSTimer to give it blocks capability.
Creates and returns a block-based NSTimer object and schedules it on the current run loop.

Parameter.Name: inTimeInterval
Parameter.Abstract: The number of seconds between firings of the timer.

Parameter.Name: inBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that the NSTimer fires.

Parameter.Name: inRepeats
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, the timer will repeatedly reschedule itself until invalidated. If NO, the timer will be invalidated after it fires.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSTimer object, configured according to the specified parameters.
